instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the forms of ser and estar.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: A dialog window will instruct you to click on forms of either ser or estar. Click on each form you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose the form of ser or estar from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correctly conjugated form of ser or estar. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
